books.author: by J.D. Robb
books.description: Lt. Eve Dallas investigates the murder of a professional gossip who dabbled in blackmail; by Nora Roberts, writing pseudonymously.
books.name: SECRETS IN DEATH

books.author: by Kyle Mills
books.description: Vince Flynn's character Mitch Rapp leaves the C.I.A. to go on a manhunt when the nephew of a Saudi King finances a terrorist group.
books.name: ENEMY OF THE STATE

books.author: by John le Carré
books.description: Peter Guillam, formerly of the British Secret Service, is pulled out of retirement to defend intelligence operations during the cold war that resulted in the deaths of people close to him.
books.name: A LEGACY OF SPIES

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: The collective clown phobias of seven teenagers are rekindled in their adult lives by the terrifying title character. Originally published in 1986.
books.name: IT

books.author: by Christine Feehan
books.description: Emeline Sanchez fights to recover from exchanging blood with a master vampire, even as she tries to heal the children she saved from him. A Carpathian novel.
books.name: DARK LEGACY

books.author: by Sue Grafton
books.description: The 25th Kinsey Millhone mystery novel. A former student from an elite private school is released from prison and a sociopath returns to haunt the detective.
books.name: Y IS FOR YESTERDAY

books.author: by Craig Johnson
books.description: The 13th Walt Longmire novel. A parole hearing of a serial killer and the decades-old memory of a train ride with Wyoming sheriffs put Longmire on a collision course between past and present.
books.name: THE WESTERN STAR

books.author: by J. A. Jance
books.description: When J. P. Beaumont is asked to investigate the death of his nemesis, it leads to an old case once thought solved.
books.name: PROOF OF LIFE

books.author: by Lisa Wingate
books.description: A South Carolina lawyer, researching her grandmother’s past, learns about a Tennessee orphanage that kidnapped children and placed them for adoption with wealthy people. Based on a real-life scandal.
books.name: BEFORE WE WERE YOURS

books.author: by Louise Penny
books.description: Chief Superintendent Gamache regrets not acting on a hunch when a body is discovered.
books.name: GLASS HOUSES

books.author: by Ruth Ware
books.description: A travel writer on a cruise is certain she has heard a body thrown overboard, but no one believes her.
books.name: THE WOMAN IN CABIN 10

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A whistleblower alerts a Florida investigator to judicial corruption involving the Mob and Indian casinos.
books.name: THE WHISTLER

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: The author Alexandra Winslow, writing under the pseudonym Alexander Green, creates a double life that isolates her.
books.name: THE RIGHT TIME

books.author: by Diana Gabaldon
books.description: An English nurse is transported back to 1743 during a second honeymoon in the Scottish Highlands.
books.name: OUTLANDER

books.author: by Janet Evanovich
books.description: The bounty hunter Stephanie Plum juggles the investigation of a crime in an ice cream factory and the two men in her life.
books.name: TURBO TWENTY-THREE
